name: to-do-list-top
description: A To-Do list created using webpack for The Odin Project # Learning Objectives - Create Todo objects that will be dynamically created using factories or constructor/classes - Include properties such as **Title, Description, dueDate, priority, etc** - Separate app logic from DOM - Add external libraries from NPM (date-fns, localStorage)

scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
